description:
Apartment is brand new & prime location in Williamsburg. Down the street from McCarren Park & close to countless restaurants and things to do. Steps from subway station access and a 7 min ride to Union Square. 
Building is extremely clean & quiet, accessible only by key access with video intercom in apartment. Great balcony space and the view of the Manhattan skyline from the bedroom.  Views even more stunning from roof access! Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and even business travelers.

The unit itself is a studio but feels more like a one bedroom due to the partition wall. The apartment feels comfortable & cozy but also spacious and the tall ceilings are just an added bonus.

- The entire apartment
- Rooftop deck 
- Private gym and washer & dryer located on the first floor 
- Bike lock storage 
- Zipcars
name: Beautiful Brand New Williamsburg Apt
review: Ein wirklich tolles Apartment mit einem atemberaubenden Ausblick auf Manhattan, z.B. mit direktem Blick auf das Empire State Building. Das Apartment entspricht genau der Beschreibung und die Gastgeber waren auch sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Die Lage überzeugt zudem, da es lediglich wenige U-Bahn Stationen von Manhattan entfernt liegt. In der Nähe liegen zudem viele Restaurants und Bars. Besonders für Gäste (wie wir), die New York entdecken wollen, ist es wirklich eine tolle Unterkunft.
